A. Torralba
dcterms:description: ADE20K has 20210 training, 2000 validation and 3352 testing images. It is created for the ImageNet scene parsing challenge. The segmentation task in this dataset is to label each pixel to one of the 150 semantic classes.
dcterms:title: ADE20K

dcterms:creator: R. Mottaghi
X. Chen
X. Liu
N.-G. Cho
S.-W. Lee
S. Fidler
R. Urtasun
A. Yuille
dcterms:description: PASCAL-Context has 4998 training images and 5105 testing images. The images are sampled originally from the PASCAL VOC 2010 dataset and re-labeled at the pixel-level for the segmentation task. In total, there are 540 classes, however, in our experiments we only consider the task of labeling 59 classes (most frequent classes) for evaluation.
dcterms:title: PASCAL-Context

dcterms:creator: M. Everingham
L. Van Gool
C. K. I. Williams
J. Winn
A. Zisserman
dcterms:description: PASCAL VOC 2011 has around 11287 training images, 736 images as validation set and 1111 testing images. The task here is to classify each pixel into one of 21 categories, including 20 foreground object classes and one background class.
dcterms:title: PASCAL VOC 2011
